original_title: Lee Ritenour: RIT Special - Steps Ahead Live in Tokyo
overview: This sixth volume of the DOUBLE TIME JAZZ COLLECTION presents a pair of concerts from two of the biggest names in jazz fusion. Recorded in California in 1984, LEE RITENOUR - RIT SPECIAL finds guitarist Lee Ritenour performing a selection of mostly original material that includes "Heavenly Bodies," "Mr. Briefcase," "Dolphin Dreams," and many more. STEPS AHEAD - LIVE IN TOKYO features fusion band Steps Ahead advancing their unique brand of electric jazz in a 1986 concert that includes performances of "Beirut," "Self Portrait," "Charlayne," and many more.  This DVD includes both programs with on-screen notes about the concert, full biographical details, and extensive background information about the artists and songs.
title: Lee Ritenour: RIT Special - Steps Ahead Live in Tokyo
